com.cmput3owo1.moodlet.services

Interface IUserServiceProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserService

    public interface IUserServiceProvider
    Interface that abstracts user service functions. It contains functions for user registration and login. User registration functions includes validating usernames, creating the account and putting their information into the database. Login functions include login and making checking if there was a previous instance of a logged in account

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IUserServiceProvider.LoginListener
      Interface that creates a listener for the login fragment.
      static interface  IUserServiceProvider.RegistrationListener
      Interface that creates a listener for the register fragment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String fullname, IUserServiceProvider.RegistrationListener listener)
      This a wrapper function that is called to create a user account with their email and password.
      boolean hasPreviousLogin()
      This function is called to check if there is an existing instance of the logged in user.
      void loginUser(java.lang.String txt_email, java.lang.String txt_password, IUserServiceProvider.LoginListener listener)
      This is a wrapper function that is called to login a user with their email and password.
      void putUserIntoDB(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String fullname, java.lang.String username, IUserServiceProvider.RegistrationListener listener)
      This function is called to put the registered user into the database.
      void validateUsernameAndCreateUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String fullname, IUserServiceProvider.RegistrationListener listener)
      This function first checks if the username is taken.

    • Method Detail

      • hasPreviousLogin

        boolean hasPreviousLogin()
        This function is called to check if there is an existing instance of the logged in user.

      • validateUsernameAndCreateUser

        void validateUsernameAndCreateUser(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String email,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   java.lang.String fullname,
                                   IUserServiceProvider.RegistrationListener listener)
        This function first checks if the username is taken. If the username is not taken, the account will be created, otherwise it will notify the user that their username is already taken
        Parameters:
        username - Username to register with.
        email - Email to register with.
        password - Password of Account to register with.
        fullname - Full name of user registering.
        listener - Registration listener passed from fragment
